casebody.data:
CHARLESTON & WESTERN CAROLINA RAILWAY COMPANY, Appellant, v. Annie C. V. FLEMING et al., Appellees. No. 11988. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Oct. 28, 1947. Joseph B. Cumming, of Augusta, Ga., for appellant. Rodney S. Cohen and Rodney S. Cohen, Jr., both of Augusta, Ga., and Estes Dore-mus, of Atlanta, Ga., for appellee.

Before SIBLEY, HOLMES, and LEE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

No reversible error of law appearing, and the evidence justifying the verdict, the judgment appealed from is affirmed.
